dcterms:creator: Y. Wu
D. C. Coll
dcterms:description: The W-plane method is a traditional single bitmap block truncation coding scheme known for its simplicity and low time consumption, although it has poor performance in visual quality.
dcterms:title: W-plane method

dcterms:creator: S. C. Tai
W. J. Chen
P. J. Cheng
dcterms:description: GA-AMBTC is a genetic algorithm-based scheme for single bitmap absolute moment block truncation coding of color images, which shows improved performance over previous methods.
dcterms:title: GA-AMBTC

dcterms:creator: C. C. Chang
M. N. Wu
dcterms:description: GSBTC is an algorithm for color image compression based on common bitmap block truncation coding, which utilizes a gradual search algorithm.
dcterms:title: GSBTC

dcterms:creator: Z. Li
Q. Jin
C. C. Chang
dcterms:description: BACO-BTC is a common bitmap block truncation coding method for color images that employs binary ant colony optimization to enhance performance.
dcterms:title: BACO-BTC
